tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a great experience consulting Dr. Anjali Bapat as she explained me the root of my problem and suggested various natural remedies to cure the same. She also suggested a change in lifestyle that is necessary to live a healthy life. I would definitely recommend her if you don't want to rely on antibiotic medicines and treat your health issues with natural remedies.
reply_text: Thank u Nupura and wish u good health .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I started consultation with Dr. Anjali Bapat in  pre-pregnancy time with the aim to conceive naturally.One of the other doctor who I visited before, suggested the drilling treatment for ovaries in order to conceive, at the very starting. However, Anjali Ma'am guided that we should go through conceiving process level by level, first step being to conceive by natural process. She also explained the things with related body functions along with diagrams in great detail.Throughout the pregnancy she was very very supportive, always available on call and whatsapp any time and so many times acted as psychological cum emotional counseller for me. She has always guided for taking simple, nutritious and homemade foods, which has helped a lot during pregnancy.Just before delivery, she did my emotional counselling and unlike others waited for almost 12 hrs for my normal delivery. After that, I delivered a healthy baby boy.She has given all kind of possible support in the most important time of my life and helped me with delivering a healthy baby boy.For me, I would not have got a better doctor and a better person in this beautiful process of motherhood.
reply_text: God bless you all. Enjoy parenthood and lots of love to little one :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Anjali  for treatment of some infection in my genitals till then I was not aware of the term Herpes . The best thing which I liked about her was her friendliness & responsiveness. I felt like I was talking to my friend and I was very comfortable in telling my problems .Meeting Dr. Anjali was very soothing & pleasant . Patiently she checked up and explained the issue to me  . I  will highly recommend Dr.  Anjali . Sometimes we just meet Doctor and get better. She has that magic in her . Just loved the experience.
reply_text: Farah , thank u for yr appreciative words promptly expressed. Wish u all the best for everything in yr life. Take care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife and myself  were newly expecting parents, With our first visit we were confident and relief that we found right person for our 1st pregnancy journey, Madam was very patient, kind and always available for all our concerns and queries. She has an excellent team of her medical practitioners with her and my wife delivered healthy baby boy with her guidance. I would recommend Anjali madam for any one looking for pregnancy related concerns or very good mid mid wife who will always be there with all her/his yrs of experience in this critical period for expecting parents . Thanks a lot madam once again for all the things.
reply_text: Thank u üôè

review: Word of caution - I, like many of my friends, did not have the courage to proceed beyond the first consultation. * ** ******* **** ****** ***** * **** **** ****** **** *********** ** ** ** ***** ******** ******* ** *****  Our negative experience is related to complete insensitivity by the doctor covered across the spectrum including diagnosis, prognosis and even plain consultation.  All of us had left the room in tears believing the most negative outcome and that there was nothing better possible. If you feel pressured into a line of treatment that is very hard for you to accept (tight hug), please do ask if there is any risk in deferring it. Please do find the strength and courage to get multiple opinions; I went through 4 before I arrived at one that suited me, each being better than the previous one (dr Bapat was my first). In my experience, several positive details emerged as I proceeded, whereas Dr Bapats consultation was extremely comprehensive on the negative case scenario list (my friends' experience has been the same). She is very well versed with insurance procedures and documentation! If you do not find yourself getting anxiety attacks and crying continuously, you have moved past our stage and can then seek reviews on the technical bit.  All the best in your journey, tight hug, lots of love, luck and remember.. you got this! üòä
reply_text: Good luck to you .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It is rare to find a doctor who is so diligent about making the patient understand the roots of the issue and advise the appropriate action to treat it. And Dr. Anjali is one among such. She could have easily prescribed a few medicines to help me treat the issue temporarily, but she took the effort to make us understand the problem in great detail and suggested us the right approach to deal with this issue, which would be helpful for lifetime and not just temporarily. I've never met a doctor like her before, with a Very holistic approach, and i am very glad to have consulted Dr.Anjali. Highly recommended.
reply_text: Neha it was my pleasure helping both of u. I wish u all the very best in life. üôè

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: During Covid time, my wife was having irritation in the vagina. Based upon the reviews by other patient, i visited the doctor. ******** ****** *** ***** ***** *** ****** ******* **** ******* ** **** **** **** ** ** ***** prescribed medicine citing it as a normal infection. Since the problem was not diagnosed, we again visited the doctor but still she was reluctant to see the vagina of my wife. On request, she inspected my wife and give a medicine. We completed the course, however my wife vagina got so swollen and there was a drastic weight gain of my wife. We are so helpless *** *** ** **** ****** ********** *** **** ** *********** ****** *** ******** We request everyone to please avoid this doctor.
reply_text:
Sorry for deday in reply... as I wanted to check my records regarding your wife. Yes... your wife had come to me for first time on 16 th June 2020 and follow up on 2 nd July 2020. She has a condition called Vaginismus ... due to which internal examination is often not possible due to pain and was not done ( she was reluctant). As I remember... i had explained this to her in details and had told her that she will need treatment for Vaginismus... but she did not come later on. 

Drastic weight gain does not happen due to any vaginal condition.  

Its unfortunate that you did not follow up... 

I wish both of you good luck.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review: I have been going to Dr. Anjali Bapat for about 2.5 years now. Started at a time when there was a complication in my pregnancy. She is extremely professional, accurate in her diagnosis, explains things very clearly, calm in her demeanor and approachable at any point of time. She was a great support for me during my delivery, especially as it was during the lockdown and Covid-19 times. Throughout the time, she was always reachable for any doubts and references and lent a sense of reassurance at times of tension. Would highly recommend her.
reply_text: Thank u dear. Whats the name of yr little one ? Good luck and blessings.  Take care üòÄ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Anjali Bapat is phenomenal! I was to have a fibroid removal surgery with another top gynac but just two days before my surgery I didn‚Äôt have any confidence as that doctor wasn‚Äôt responding to my queries. 

I visited doctor Anjali for a second opinion and didn‚Äôt tell her I had met with another doctor and was due for surgery in less than 48 hours. I wanted an unbiased opinion from her, and she spoke to me and my husband in such detail about my situation that even a child would understand. She drew diagrams, told me that if I went in for surgery what would it be like and explained every minute detail of the post operative care. I left the clinic hoping that she would have been my gynac. 

I took a chance and called her at 10:30 pm on Monday night and explained the whole situation to her and asked if she would do my surgery and within half an hour at that point in the night she had everything arranged for me and that too for the same surgery date and within 48 hours I was able to  continue with my surgery with a doctor I was more confident with. Throughout the pre and post operative care she was just a message away. Always prompt to respond and always so caring. 

If you have a good doctor, half your battle is won. Dr Anjali is someone who really cares for her patients and there were multiple times I just felt so good that I made that decision to swap to her. 


The whole journey
reply_text:
So kind of u 2 share yr entire story.

I am happy to help u in yr short stay here. 

Wish u all the best for yr further journey. 
I am sure everything is going 2 b just fine.
Tk care. Good luck once again üëç

review: She didn't give any consultation and asked me to visit her chamber. I feel wronged to have spent 1000 rupees for just her contact details! * ***** **** * *******
reply_text:
1. This was online consultation 

2. U wanted pre conception counselling 

3. For yr issue.... it is imp to take detailed history, do clinical  examination,  explain to both partners all details and decide further course of treatment 

4. On line platform is not adequate and can not gv justice to yr issue.

5. As u stay in Mumbai..... i asked u 2 visit clinic keeping yr interest in mind.

6. With respect to consultation fees..... u never mentioned that 1000 Rs is not affordable to u.

7. I do gv concession to deserving low socio economic individuals.... 

8. U r still welcome if u wish to....

9. Rs: 1000 charge for on line consultation is by Practo and for the length of time given by the consultant on phone.

10. Good luck 2 u
